page.title: 19FASHION & PRICES
page.content:
FASHION AND PRICES (NUALA FITZPATRICK 2 PAGES)
Nowadays there is both formal and casual fashion. On a formal occasion older men wear a suit which consists of a matching jacket, trousers and waistcoat. The average price of a suit would be Â£100.
On a formal occasion older women would also wear a suit but their suit consists of a matching skirt, a blouse and a jacket which on average would cost Â£80_Â£90.
Casual clothes for men consists of jeans and a sweat shirt which costs in the region of Â£30 while women would casually wear jeans or corduroy trousers with a tee shirt costing about Â£35.
